title: old league client is gone.
body:
I got access to the alpha client about a week ago and since it doesn't have everything the old client does I been going back and forth between them. But today when I tried to get on the old client by clicking on it on my desktop I get the error "The item lol.launcher.exe that this shortcut refers to has been changed or moved so this will shortcut will no longer work properly" I thought thats weird so I checked my league of legends folder and the old client isn't there! only the alpha client. When I open the alpha client everything works fine I have no idea what happened or how to get the old client back.

Picture of the league folder
http://i.imgur.com/353ZgiI.png?2

replies.body: The alpha client is completely independent of the live client, so installing it should not cause you to lose the other.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to see if it can find your game files and perform a fresh repair.  Otherwise, it may need to be reinstalled.  Hope that helps!

I tried using the hextech repair tool but when I try to use it it says that my game isnt installed in the default location then ask me to select my lol.launcher.exe but the thing is I don't have that. Just going to have to reinstall I guess.

I would 100% reinstall. I had a similar issue with moving files and wouldn't be able to play at all (constantly get Bug Splat crash). I uninstalled both the main/alpha client and everything works 100%!
